short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Easily search the web with Symbaloo when you open a new tab.
short.de: Durchsuchen Sie das Web ganz einfach mit Symbaloo, wenn Sie einen neuen Tab öffnen.
short.es: Busque fácilmente en la web con Symbaloo cuando abra una nueva pestaña.
short.fr: Recherchez facilement sur le Web avec Symbaloo lorsque vous ouvrez un nouvel onglet.
short.nl: Zoek eenvoudig op internet met Symbaloo wanneer u een nieuw tabblad opent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Discover the power of Symbaloo Search, a Symbaloo-based search engine designed to provide you with informative and relevant results. This extension enhances your browsing by integrating the convenience of Symbaloo’s search capabilities directly into your browser. Whether you’re looking for educational resources, professional tools, or personal interests, Symbaloo Search delivers high-quality results tailored to your needs. Enhance your online research and resource discovery with Symbaloo Search – the perfect tool for educators, students, and anyone seeking a more efficient way to find information on the web.

The main advantages are:
✔️ Easy to start searching from a new tab
✔️ Really Fast
✔️ News Feed with the latest News
✔️ Easy access to Symbaloo homepage
✔️ Free!

About Symbaloo

With Symbaloo you surf with one click to all of your favorite websites.

Symbaloo is an easy-to-use online application and best of all, it’s free. You will have all of your favorite websites at your fingertips, anywhere and always. Choose your favorite websites and within a few clicks, you can create your very own homepage. With an account, your favorites are available on any iPhone, PC, Mac, iPad, and tablet. Wherever you go, you always have access to your favorite websites. 

In 2024 over 6 million people are using Symbaloo as their homepage!

The main advantages are:
✔️ Never have to type in an address manually
✔️ With one click you go anywhere on the web
✔️ Add a new website with one click to your account
✔️ Never lose your favorite websites again
✔️ Free!

Features:
📱 Your favorites automatically sync between your iPhone, PC, Mac, and iPad.
🌎 Instantly add new websites to your homepage
📰 Integrated RSS reader for all of your favorite news sources
🔗 Share your favorites with others
🖼️ Personalize your homepage with custom backgrounds
